entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 11:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SE 42 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon.
